products.name: LABUBU The Monsters - Tasty Macarons Series
products.description: LABUBU loves macarons! This special edition features LABUBU in various macaron-inspired colors and designs. Each figure stands approximately 3 inches tall.

products.name: LABUBU The Monsters - Have a Seat Series
products.description: The Have a Seat series features LABUBU in various sitting poses. Perfect for display on shelves or desks. Blind box series with 12 designs to collect.

products.name: LABUBU The Monsters - Diver Series
products.description: Dive into adventure with LABUBU! This aquatic-themed series features diving helmets, snorkels, and underwater accessories.

products.name: LABUBU Plush - Large Pink Edition
products.description: Soft and huggable LABUBU plush toy in signature pink. Measures 12 inches tall with premium materials and embroidered details.

products.name: LABUBU The Monsters - Zimomo Series
products.description: The mysterious Zimomo series brings LABUBU into a magical world. Features special glow-in-the-dark elements.

products.name: LABUBU Keychain Collection - Set of 5
products.description: Take LABUBU everywhere! This keychain set includes 5 different mini LABUBU designs, each approximately 2 inches tall.

products.name: LABUBU The Monsters - Patisseries De Nuit
products.description: Night bakery themed LABUBU series featuring pastry chef outfits and sweet accessories. Limited collaboration edition.

products.name: LABUBU Mini Figure - Mystery Box
products.description: Mini LABUBU mystery box! Contains one random figure from various series. Perfect starter for new collectors.

products.name: LABUBU Plush - Rainbow Collection
products.description: Special edition rainbow LABUBU plush with color-changing fur effect. Limited to 500 pieces worldwide.

products.name: LABUBU The Monsters - Time to Chill
products.description: Relaxation themed series featuring LABUBU in cozy outfits with pillows, blankets, and sleepy accessories.
